name: aem-site-template-basic
description: Basic AEM Site Template that serves as a clean starting point.
license: MIT License, Copyright 2020 Adobe Systems Incorporated

scripts.deploy: echo "-F file=@`node -p -e "p=require('./package.json'); p.name+'-'+p.version+'.zip'"`" | xargs curl -u admin:admin http://localhost:4502/conf/global/site-templates.import.html
